snippet: Though tourists have returned, and jobs and construction are up, some fear another bubble and see a fundamental shift away from gambling.
abstract: Tourists, jobs and housing are returning to Las Vegas after city was battered by recession, but some fear another bubble and see fundamental reordering of city's economy, with a shift away from gambling; hope is that as Las Vegas moves away from reputation as the only gaming destination in the United States, it will hold up as a tourist destination based on its renowned nightclubs, high-end restaurants and luxury shopping.
lead_paragraph: Though tourists have returned, and jobs and construction are up, some fear another bubble and see a fundamental shift away from gambling.

headline.main: Crowds Return to Las Vegas, but Gamble Less
headline.print_headline: Crowds Return to Las Vegas, but Gamble Less
